wikidata_hint: Wikidata: has P84 (architect) OR P149 (architectural style) OR notable building classes
apply_when: IF (wikidata has P84 OR P149) OR (osm has architect:wikidata) OR (tags already contains architect:*) OR (keywords strongly indicate architecture)
notes: 用于建筑巡礼筛选；不改变主分类

apply_when: "IF you can extract architect name from wikidata/osm"
notes: 建议统一英文全名，避免同名歧义；可另存 wikidata QID 在 custom_fields

apply_when: "IF you can extract style from wikidata (P149) OR infer from keywords"
notes: 风格建议用英文标准名；也可加 style_qid 到 custom_fields

apply_when: "IF architect is in your Pritzker architect set"

wikidata_hint: Wikidata: award statement with date (P585) year
apply_when: "IF you can fetch year from award statement"

google_keywords: feminist;women's;gender equality;women's rights;women's center;feminist bookstore;women's museum
wikidata_hint: Wikidata: women’s museum;women’s organization;gender equality related topics
apply_when: IF keywords/theme hit OR wikidata topic hit OR curated list hit
IF google type indicates OR fsq indicates brunch OR keywords/osm tags indicate
notes: 作为餐饮属性，不做主分类
作为店铺风格属性；主分类仍是 shop/thrift_store
用于区分普通 shop 与二手
